intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you wish you could do?
What do you like to eat?
What do you like to do with your friends?
What do you like most about your home?

respond_situations.starter_line: Do you want tea or coffee?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You need to choose a drink.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you like to do?
What do you want to buy?
respond_situations.description: You are at a shop. You want to buy fruit.

ask_situations.instruction: You want to ask for a ride home. You ask your parent. ..
You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper where the milk is.
You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.

listening_script.text: I pack my school bag. I put in my books. I take my pencil case. I need my lunch box. I carry my water bottle.

questions.question: Where do I put my lunch box?

follow_up_questions.question: What do you like about your neighbourhood?
Where is your house in the neighbourhood?
How is the park in your neighbourhood?
